IFNULL(GET_COMMON_CODE_VALUE('CTY',T1.CARTYPE_CODE) , '' ) AS CARTYPE_NAME /*차종명*/ , IFNULL(T1.FUEL_CODE , '') AS FUEL_CODE /*연료code*/ -- , IFNULL(GET_COMMON_CODE_VALUE('FL', T1.FUEL_CODE) , '') AS FUEL_NAME /*연료명*/ , IFNULL(T1.TRANSMISSION_CODE , '') AS TRANSMISSION_CODE /*변속기구분code*/ -- , IFNULL(GET_COMMON_CODE_VALUE('TM', T1.TRANSMISSION_CODE) , '') AS TRANSMISSION_NAME /*변속기명*/ , IFNULL(T1.DRIVE_TYPE_CODE , '') AS DRIVE_TYPE_CODE /*구동방식구분code*/ -- , IFNULL(GET_COMMON_CODE_VALUE('TM', T1.DRIVE_TYPE_CODE) , '') AS DRIVE_TYPE_NAME /*구동방식구분명*/ , IFNULL(T1.DRIVE_LICENSE_CODE , '') /*승차인원*/ , IFNULL(T1.DISPLACEMENT , '') AS DISPLACEMENT /*배기량*/ , IFNULL(T1.YEAR , '') AS 'YEAR' /*연식*/ , IFNULL(T1.COLOR_NAME , '') AS COLOR_NAME /*색상*/ , IFNULL(T1.PY_IDX , '') AS PY_IDX /*요금IDX*/ , IFNULL(T1.REG_ID , '') AS REG_ID /*등록자*/ , IFNULL(T1.REG_DT , '') AS REG_DT /*등록일시*/ , IFNULL(T1.MOD_ID , '') AS MOD_ID /*수정자*/ , IFNULL(T1.MOD_DT , '') AS MOD_DT /*수정일시*/ , IFNULL(T1.DEL_YN , '') AS DEL_YN /*삭제여부*/ , IFNULL(T1.IMG_IDX , '') AS IMG_IDX /*이미지IDX*/ FROM DC_CAR_MODEL T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.MD_IDX LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyWord} || '%'
AND IFNULL(GET_COMMON_CODE_VALUE('CN',T1.COUNTRY_CODE) , '' ) LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyWord} || '%'
AND IFNULL(GET_COMMON_CODE_VALUE('CR', T1.MANUFACTURER_CODE) , '' ) LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyWord} || '%'
AND T1.YEAR LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyWord} || '%'
AND T1.MODEL_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyWord} || '%'
AND T1.MODEL_DETAIL_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyWord} || '%'

SELECT IFNULL(MD_IDX , '') AS MD_IDX /*모델 IDX*/ , IFNULL(IMG_IDX , '') AS IMG_IDX /*이미지 IDX*/ , IFNULL(CARTYPE_CODE , '') AS CARTYPE_CODE /*이미지 IDX*/ FROM DC_CAR_MODEL
AND MD_IDX =#{mdIdx}

/* 이미지 등록 여부 */ FROM DC_CAR_MODEL T1 , DC_COMMON_CODE T2
